entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Spring 2024 repo health check #101456
  • \ character in directory name prevents compilation #101452
  • [API Proposal]: Enumerable.SequenceEqual #101448
  • Use IAsyncEnumerable to iterate through nested array in object returned from API #101446
  • HTTPS requests fail on Ubuntu 24.04 Noble ARM32 due to bundled certs "NotTimeValid" error #101444
  • [API Proposal]: Determine Reference Type Nullability during runtime #101438
  • List Add is way slower (almost 3 times) in `net9.0 preview 3` than with `net8.0` #101437
  • [browser] `System.Buffers.ArrayPool.Tests.ArrayPoolUnitTests` fails with out of memory #101436
  • [mono][wasm] UnmanagedCallersOnly is not being called after publish #101434
  • Arm64 SVE: Size of vector is always 128bits #101433
  • [mono] Mono doesn't allocate nested structures to the same offsets as CoreCLR #101432
  • [mono][ios] `ToFrozenSet` crashes on iOS devices with `8.0.3` release #101427
    8.0.x
  • System.IO.FileSystem.Tests.WorkItemExecution CI timeout on net9.0-osx-Debug-x64-Mono_Minijit_Debug-OSX.1200.Amd64.Open #101423
  • Incorrect String Comparison Results with ICU #101422
    Future
  • [browser][MT] WebGL with threads #101421
    9.0.0
  • MIssing runtime deps for 8.0.4 #101413
  • [mono] Refactor switch statements in `process_bb` to reduce redundancy #101412
    Future
  • Stale async task when flooding the network with too many async http requests #101411
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests - Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #101409
  • [SOS] Intermittent Connection Issues with HttpClient in .NET 6 #101407

Closed

  • JIT/opt/Vectorization/UnrollEqualsStartsWith/UnrollEqualsStartsWith.dll takes 2 hours to complete in gcstress on osx-arm64 #101453
    9.0.0
  • Add a non-generic IReadOnlyCollection interface #23337
    Future
  • How are we doing in the repo? -- spot check #92378
    9.0.0
  • Infinite recursion between System.Threading.Lock and System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ClassConstructorRunner in NativeAOT #99663
    9.0.0
  • How to use CoSetProxyBlanket in P/Invoke source generator? #101157
  • [MONO][Wasm] Potential function signature mismatch in m2n invoke #99514
    9.0.0
  • Regex.Match is different between .NET 8.0.4 and .NET Framework 4.8 #101223
    9.0.0
  • [browser][hybrid] drop wrap_error_root,wrap_no_error_root #98365
    9.0.0
  • Bump iOS/tvOS minimum supported version to 12.2 #91736
    9.0.0
  • Received an unexpected EOF or 0 bytes from the transport stream #100773
  • I think that `Partition.Trim(...)` from `ArraySharedPool<T>` may be doing some unnecessary work #101025
  • System.Text.Json serializing null becomes "null" as 'serialized' object #101419
  • NativeAOT in Unity #101414
  • HTTPClient is not reusing the SSL/TLS1.2 session and does handshake on every request #100119

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] Merge #92901 into release/8.0-staging #101459
    needs-area-label
  • Add test for boxing byreflike fail. #101458
    needs-area-label
  • Add implicit operator ROS<string?> for StringValues #101457
    area-Extensions-Primitives, 9.0.0
  • Add `hostfxr_resolve_frameworks_for_runtime_config` for resolving runtime frameworks #101451
    area-Host
  • [cdac] Read/store globals from contract descriptor #101450
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add more logging to HTTP3 and QUIC code #101449
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix failing ReadAsStreamAsync_HandlerProducesWellBehavedResponseStream for Http3 #101447
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix condition for disabling extra checks in verify_class_overrides #101445
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Support using the system rapidjson to build #101443
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [mono] UnsafeAccessor: Add support for non-generic method instance #101442
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Disable frequently failing tests #101439
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add TensorPrimitives.Max/MinNumber #101435
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Initial prototype for strength reduction #101431
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix checks to accommodate register wraparounds in multi-reg ops #101430
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix big endian issue in Interlocked test cases #101429
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Disable most of S.T.Json trimming tests on AOT the right way #101418
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Properly disable S.L.Queryable trimming tests with AOT #101417
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Run System.Net.Http trimming tests with AOT #101416
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use bison for ilasm parser generator #101415
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • enable dependabot for github actions #101406
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Disable UnrollEqualsStartsWith for gcstress. The test takes very long time. #101455
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix comment #101440
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix running tests with process isolation under naot #100331
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix SocketsHttpHandlerTest_HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ReadAsStreamAsync_Cancellation data race #101428
    area-System.Net
  • Switch s390x and PPC64 to Mariner host OS, not ancient Ubuntu #101424
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix class construction cycle in Lock on NativeAOT #100374
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] TypeDescriptor threading fixes #101305
    Servicing-approved, area-System.ComponentModel, 8.0.6
  • Fix incorrect suffix search for alternation with RegexOptions.RightToLeft #101408
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/8.0-staging] crashinfo.cpp/crashinfounix.cpp: use off_t instead of off64_t #101272
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Fix function signature mismatch in m2n invoke #101106
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser][hybrid] drop `wrap_error_root`, `wrap_no_error_root` #101390
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [mono] Optimize startup vtable setup #101312
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Do not use link flags for bitcode compilation #101397
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Miscellaneous startup optimizations #101263
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove AD0001 from NoWarn #101404
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: metrics for profile consistency, gdv, devirt... #101403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump minimum Apple OS versions #101342
    area-Infrastructure
  • Dedup UnboundedChannel and UnboundedPriorityChannel #101396
    area-System.Threading.Channels, 9.0.0
  • Remove some dead code from SharedArrayPool #101410
    area-System.Buffers
  • Adjust the calleeSavedRegs on top frame for LoongArch64/RISCV64 #100962
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Use BitOperations.RoundUpToPowerOf2 in more places #101405
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Avoid rooting X509Certificate2 in SslSessionCache #101144
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Avoid rooting X509Certificate2 in SslSessionCache #101167
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [LoongArch64] amend the LoongArch64Classifier::Classify for passing struct. #101365
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Reapply params ReadOnlySpan overloads without params keyword #101308
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0

Updated

  • [mono] Interpret static constructors without a runtime invoke wrapper #101324
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Implement Activity.AddLink #101381
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • GC: Fix survival rates for LOH/POH #100716
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add managed blocking info for lock and monitor waits #101192
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • TypeName parsing API #100094
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Remove distros versions calculation #100580
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Linker dependency framework #101277
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Create separate attribute for warning behavior differences #101220
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/6.0-staging] TypeDescriptor threading fixes #101306
    Servicing-approved, area-System.ComponentModel, 6.0.31
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix AV in host from tracing on exit #101260
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.31
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Expose the `ConvertToIntegerNative` APIs #100993
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Simplify managed MetadataImport creation #101353
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] firefox testing #100697
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Prefer most derived member in Configuration Binder source generator #101316
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Tensor wave 1 API's. #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add CreateWhileLessThan* #100949
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Merge #91646 and #91708 into release/8.0-staging #101313
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Count*BitElements #101188
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Change all Cookie localized DateTime logic with Universal alternative #100489
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Rework ProbabilisticMap character checks in SearchValues #101001
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Use common CodeGen::genHomeRegisterParams #101288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][interp] Resolve virtual method on delegates created by compiled code #101290
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Rewrite initial parameter frame layout in terms of new ABI info #101340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WASI] update SDK 22 and wasmtime 19.0.2 #101392
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [browser] More meaningful code in browser template #101287
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Refresh cached credentials after PreAuthenticate fails #101053
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix data race leading to a deadlock when opening QuicStream #101250
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [mono] Fix `LLVMArgWasmVtypeAsScalar` when a method doesn't set its return value #101299
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Predicated Abs, Predicated/UnPredicated Add, Conditional Select #100743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • [LoongArch64] Enable printing disassembly instructions under release mode for JitDisasm. #101281
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Annotate `config.GetValue()` with `[NotNullIfNotNull]` #101336
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary indirect use of managed wcslen from AppContext setup #101318
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove received bytes length check #100619
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • JIT: Check more invariants on ABI info #101372
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify BigInteger.Multiply #98587
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

entry.content:

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-23
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Microsoft.WindowsDesktop.App.Runtime pack should respect WinForms-Wpf profiles #37088

Updated

  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Build_Components_WithDesktopMSBuild_Works appears to be failing flakily #39960
  • GivenThatWeHaveAPackageReferenceWithAliases tests failing in CI #39068
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Qualys scan showing vulnerabilities in SDK #30659
  • dotnet 6.0.26+ SDK NuGet.Packaging Dependencies Vulnerable? #40355
  • Wrong "workload not found" message #31835
    8.0.2xx
  • x64 sdk gets stuck during installation and cannot be installed normally on ARM64. #40346

PullRequests

Created

  • Preview 5 branding #40394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix reporter encoding #40391
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Add more workload set tests #40388
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Mark UseWindowsThreadPool as feature switch #40372
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40369
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #40364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fixed a reference to the supported .editorconfig options. #40095
    untriaged

Updated

  • Add repository policy to label and close stale issues #40226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • More workload set fixes #40266
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add BeforeMicrosoftNETSdkTargets #40344
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Ignore generic type parameter names when matching #40359
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #40324
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cache contains wrong information about COM interop after changes in the COM interfaces #73191
  • Adjust `CompoundUseSiteInfo<TAssemblySymbol>.MergeAndClear` for discarding diagnostic bag #73188
    Backlog

Closed

  • IDE0053 has a non-deterministic title in SARIF logs #73070
    17.11
  • Confusing warning and unintuitive behavior of `is` operator applied to an instance of a `ref struct` #73193
  • How to have deterministic build inside git? #73161
  • Debug Assertion fails for RefSafetyAnalysis #72873
    17.11
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34822.156 #73187

PullRequests

Created

  • Cache diagnostics produced during workspace pull, to avoid unnecessary computations #73202
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache diagnostics produced during workspace pull, to avoid unnecessary computations #73201
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Ensure we always cache diag results. #73199
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update Semantic Search to work when ServiceHub is disabled #73196
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Lower drop retention from 10 years to 3 months #73190
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add more information in checksums #73200
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove specialized list pool. #73192
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove parameter which was always passed the same value #73198
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Address unstable ordering in AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #73189
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Add Semantic Search feature flag to pkgdef #73197
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove diagnostic function not used in any product code #73194
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix certain solution asserts. #73195
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use a small subset of VS JSON converters for VS Code #73180
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove mention of removed option `bootstrapConfig` from docs #73174
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Visit binary operators in ref safety analysis #73081
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Cleanup our temp-storage (memory mapped file) code. #73115
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove reflection code for C# code mapper #73186
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix LSP File watching so it correctly reports the baseUri if there's a trailing slash #73203
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement MEF based pull diagnostics #73073
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Partial properties: merging declarations and emit of simple cases #72999
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Implement Lookup APIs on extensions #72948
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Check UI context before trying to initialize cohosting #73172
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update referenced MSBuild to 17.3.4 #73113
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Enable hosts to provide custom assembly resolution #73185
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73111
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Clean up Razor EA #73040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use semantics to check for readonly struct #72893
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use a simple temp instead of InlineArray1 #73086
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Exclude assemblies shared by .NET ServiceHub host #73087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Sync solution contents consistently #72860
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Promote "Convert to interpolated string" to an analyzer/fixer (#68469) #73008
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Allow unsafe blocks in iterators #73046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Ensure source paths are comparable with editorconfig directory paths #73100
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Spring 2024 repo health check #55323
  • Blazor static site generation support #55320
  • Blazor Component cannot be nested inside a Parent component (using render fragment) if the nested component is interactive #55319
  • Captured Component reference is not set on a Component when using a Parameter #55317
  • 8.0 BlazorWebAppOidc Roles claim not being respected on [Authorize(Roles="asdfdsf")] Attributte #55314
  • Scaffolded Identity pages not overriding default implementation #55312
  • HybridCache - tags and invalidation #55308
  • Re-add proper API calls into Blazor WebAssembly template #55307
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapipublishaot #55306

Closed

  • ANCM: Randomly fails to load with White ANCM Error Page due to Directory Iteration on Startup #55216
  • Results of the Feb 2022 repo survey for dotnet/aspnetcore #41242
    Discussions
  • Different behavior for guid constraint with Swagger in Controllers and Minimal APIs #39886
    9.0-preview4
  • [Minimal API] Route parameters are not set as required when using WithOpenApi and Nullable Reference Types are disabled #46746
    9.0-preview4
  • [Tracking] Remove `Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref/*8.0*` from SourceBuildPrebuiltBaseline.xml #51339
    9.0-preview1
  • Perf improvement: mvc #55291
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #55305
  • Memory leak when serializing large string properties with System.Text.Json #51951
  • Blazor Server registers page 'unload' event instead of the recommended 'pagehide' or 'visibilitychange events #55299
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Runtime and EF Core dependencies out of date #55153
  • Update Wix versions #55087
    Infrastructure
  • Blazor WebAssembly application hosted in IIS does not load until few tries and gives an ERR_HTTP2_PROTOCOL_ERROR #54941
  • Add support for automatic inference from runtime concepts to OpenAPI annotations #44232
    Backlog
  • Reduce reliance on ApiExplorer types for `Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi` consumption #44209
    Backlog
  • Support configuring document-level parts of OpenAPI schema #44192
    .NET 9 Planning
  • XSRF-TOKEN Extraction #55284
  • Perf regression: json #55292
  • SignalR client error: The server disconnected before the handshake could be started. #55268

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix form handling and add NuGet pkg docs #55321
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Bump System.Security.Cryptography.Xml version to address CVE-2023-29331 #55304
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Update branding to preview5 #55324
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5
  • Fix command to add build tag #55315
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Address feedback on PR #54675 #55295
    area-dataprotection, 9.0-preview4
  • Remove Microsoft.Netcore.App.Ref from SourceBuild baseline #55316
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • HybridCache - minor post-PR fixes #55251
    area-infrastructure, feature-caching, 9.0-preview4
  • Run tests against latest IdentityModel once per day in Helix-Matrix #55296
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Update to new interceptable location APIs #55285
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 9.0-preview4
  • Avoid detecting AOT within other characters as a candidate for labeling. #55300
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Add support for generating JSON schemas in OpenAPI doc #55208
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview4
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.4.24221.5 #55275
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • update project templates use primary constructors #55006
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Adding accept header to callsites within SignalR #55271
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Include a warning about port spoofing in xml #54971
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-routing
  • [H/3] Fix code passed into QuicConnection.CloseAsync and QuicStream.Abort #55282
    area-networking
  • Delete flaky test MultipleThreadsForceRefresh #55290
    area-dataprotection
  • Quarantine HeartbeatLoopRunsWithSpecifiedInterval #55298
    area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Fix duplicate error.type tags in metrics #55301
    Servicing-approved, area-hosting, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Issue with Essentials.WebAuthenticator and multiple activities #22017
  • [Testing] BlazorWebViewDispatchGetsScopedServices fails occasionally on Android #22016
    Backlog
  • [BUG][iOS] Maui 8.0.10+ - CarouselView - Previous item content disappears after scrolling to next item #22015
    .NET 8 SR5
  • ObservableCollection<SomeObject>.clear throwing exception #22012
  • The UI element <Frame> causes a crash #22011
  • Scrollview\CollectionView doesn't scroll #22005
  • [Windows] App crashes when rectangle sized by a Grid has a size of 1 on 125% scale screen #22003
    .NET 8 SR5
  • OrientationStateTrigger does not work if in the setters of the state TargetName is used #22001
    .NET 8 SR5
  • [Windows] Carousel changes the current position when window is resized #22000
    .NET 8 SR5
  • Optimization can be disabled by setting the PublishTrimmed property to false. (NETSDK1144) (UNMC) #21999
  • [iOS] Media Picker UIImagePickerController closing issue #21996

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cosmos: Binding_interceptors_are_used_by_queries is flaky #33600
  • Query optimization issue when using interceptors that filter GUID fields #33599
  • The Elapsed property for CommandExecuted event is defined as string in the logs. #33598
  • Update nested Json with generic lists - System.ArgumentNullException: 'Value cannot be null. Arg_ParamName_Name' #33597
  • System.AccessViolationException: Attempted to read or write protected memory. #33596

Closed

  • CosmosDb OwnsMany is broken when multiple child entities are saved without int Id values specified #33573
  • ERROR log with event ID 20205 is raised when committing large transaction asynchronously #33319

PullRequests

Created

  • disabling flaky cosmos test #33601

Merged

  • Improve formatting #33594
  • Annotate most of the Cosmos query pipeline for NRTs #33584
  • update branding to preview5 #33595

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-23
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet-install.ps1 failing during official build #7050
  • Make "copy to latest" conditional based on default channel assignment #6951
  • In the installing UI of 5.0 Preview 2, release note link is 3.0. #6926
  • Bring back docker coverage after repo merge #7250
  • Move latest channel declaration to eng/Versions.props #6828
  • GenerateClsidMap failed unexpectedly (System.InvalidCastException) when EnableComHosting and C# 8.0 Nullable enabled #6539

Updated

  • Deliver first-class Snap installers for .NET #6991
  • Ordering of PlatformAssemblyPaths passed to crossgen is wrong #6877

PullRequests

Created

  • Preview 5 branding #19574
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #19573
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #19572
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #19571
  • Update Sdk Diff Tests baselines and exclusions #19570
  • Update MsftToSbSdk.diff #19569
  • Update MsftToSbSdk.diff #19568

Merged

  • Update table #19447
  • Publish Test Results in PR Validation #19533
  • Rename publish.proj to merge-asset-manifests.proj #19561
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #19560

Updated

  • Update to the shipping version of MSBuild #19041
  • Fix msbuild downgrade issue #19554
    DO NOT MERGE
  • Enable scenario test execution in VMR build #19222
